quest.intro.subtitle: Beginners Guide to Modded Minecraft
quest.intro.hotkeys.title: Useful Hotkeys
quest.intro.hotkeys.subtitle: The numbers... what do they mean?!
quest.intro.hotkeys.description_1: Below is a list of hotkeys you might find useful while playing.
quest.intro.hotkeys.description_2: Feel free to rebind them in the controls menu!
quest.intro.hotkeys.description_3:
F6: Advancements
F7: Open QuestBook
F8: NPC Quest Log
F9: Voice Chat Menu
F10: Skill Tree

H: Inspect your body limbs health.
G: Change gun’s fire mode.
B: Open Backpack
F: When holding gun, interact like right click. When using item scrapper table, can be placed on to the table.
Z: Open Gun’s attachment window.
I: Open Car and Plane Inventory.
X: Start Car Engine.
R: Reload when using gun, throw weapon when using melee weapon.
V: Melee if gun has a melee weapon.
C: Crawl/Slide.
N: Inspect Gun, open night vision.
M: Open world map.
Down Arrow: Throttle down simple planes.
Up Arrow: Throttle up simple planes.
\: Open world map settings.
